Package org.berthold.beamCalc

Class FormatSolutionString

java.lang.Object
org.berthold.beamCalc.FormatSolutionString
public class FormatSolutionString
extends java.lang.Object
Static helper methods for building a mathematical term showing the solution of a resultig force in detail.
Author:
Berthold

    • partOfTermForSingleLoad

      public static java.lang.String partOfTermForSingleLoad​(double force_N, double angleOfLoadIn_deg, double distance_m, Beam beam, int indexOfLoad)
      Helps building the term showing the solution for the left bearing.
      Parameters:
      force_N -
      angleOfLoadIn_deg -
      distance_m -
      beam -
      indexOfLoad -
      Returns:
      "force x distance +" if more than two forces acting or "force x distance " if only one force is acting or the force is the last one acting.

    • solutionTermForRightBearing

      public static java.lang.String solutionTermForRightBearing​(Beam beam, BeamResult result, java.lang.StringBuilder termForSolutionAtRightBearing, java.lang.String floatFormat)
      Right bearing. This builds the string containing the complete solution for the right bearing.
      Parameters:
      beam -
      result -
      termForSolutionAtRightBearing -
      floatFormat -
